channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-keyword-params (1.2)
item.description: Flake8 keyword parameter validation
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-literal (1.4)
item.description: Flake8 string literal validation
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-modern-annotations (1.6)
item.description: Flake8 modern annotations validation
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (24.1)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi stub files.

item.title: Updated: pyflakes (3.2)
item.description: passive checker of Python programs

item.title: Updated: flake8 (7)
item.description: the modular source code checker: pep8 pyflakes and co
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: nitpick (0.35)
item.description: Enforce the same settings across multiple language-independent projects
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-unused-fixtures (0.3.2)
item.description: Warn about unnecessary fixtures in tests' definition.

item.title: Updated: flake8-github (1.1)
item.description: Flake8 formatter for GitHub Actions

item.title: Updated: flake8-balanced-wrapping (0.1.7)
item.description: A flake8 plugin that helps you wrap code with visual balance.

item.title: Updated: flake8-ejudge (0.5.5)

item.description: OpenStack Hacking Guideline Enforcement

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (23.12.2)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-dunder-all (0.3.1)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin and pre-commit hook which checks to ensure modules have defined '__all__'.

item.title: Updated: flake8-helper (0.2.2)
item.description: A helper library for Flake8 plugins.

item.title: Updated: flake8-strftime (0.3.4)
item.description: A flake8 plugin which checks for use of platform specific strftime codes.

item.title: Updated: flake8-prettycount (0.1.2)
item.description: Wrapper around flake8 providing a formatted count at the end.

item.title: Updated: flake8-sphinx-links (0.2.2)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to check docstrings for double backticked strings which should be links to the Python documentation.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-encodings (0.5.1)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to identify incorrect use of encodings.

item.description: Check for python builtins being used as variables or parameters
